Modifying the Contact

10 Jun 2015 . category: tech . Comments
#tutorial

The contact part of the index page is consisted of two elements:

  1. Text
  2. Your email address

You can modify the Contact text from the /contact.html file and set the email in the site config:


email: "your@email.here"

Donâ€™t be afraid of email harvesting, write your email properly and the page will perform javascript obfuscation.

Many thanks to @joariasl for this feature!
